main.name: Keeton Martin
main.description: I am a software engineer and I've put together this page to showcase my work. Welcome to my home base on the internet
main.bio: I graduate(d) from Haverford College with a B.S. in Computer Science in May 2022. I've accepted a job offer at Salesforce as an engineer, starting in August 2022. I like to build things in Python, Java, Java/Typescript, and in my free time I like to play and think about basketball, fiddle with keyboards, and enjoy the great outdoors.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out to me using this form and I'll get back to you ASAP.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.degree: Bachelor's of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Studied Software Engineering, Algorithms, Data Structures, AI, Databases, and more. Minored in Statistics and minored in Neuroscience.
Graduated high school having focused on computer science and statistics.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
work.description: Worked in the Salesforce core on a describe utility that generates OpenAPI definitions (interfaces for RESTful APIs) for DataRaptors - an essential clicks not code tool in the Salesforce Industries stack. Independent development work on enterprise software completed with guidance of a Senior Architect and Project Manager.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Developed and published a Node.js + Typescript command line tool using the Open CLI Framework (OCLIF) to create a Salesforce DX Plugin for a previously existing NPM Library including automated upload through Jenkins to npmjs.org. Development work done independently from scratch with guidance of a Senior Engineer.

projects.title: Route Cards
projects.category: A web app to recommend a credit card based on your most frequently flown route
